name: Marble Maze (Aditya_Dheer)
description:
This game is a part of my second assignment for Introduction to game engineering - Marble Maze. This is a single player game which is inspired from star wars. In this you act as a BB-8 unit stranded in space and have to escape the empire. There are a total of 3 levels, each harder than the one before. 

It focuses on solving increasingly complicated mazes on each level. Once you complete the final level, the game resets and you're sent back to level 1.
